description: This file defines a Flutter widget called NoteCard, which displays a note preview with controls for pinning, editing, and deleting within a note-taking application.

classes.name: NoteCard
classes.description: A stateless widget that presents a summary view of a note with interactive controls.

classes.name: _SmallIconButton
classes.description: A private widget representing a small, customizable icon button used within NoteCard.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the NoteCard, displaying note details and action buttons.

methods.name: _SmallIconButton.build
methods.description: Builds a styled icon button with tooltip and color indicating danger or normal action.
